movies.name: The Godfather
movies.actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan
movies.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

movies.name: Schindler's List
movies.actors: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley
movies.plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.name: Gone with the Wind
movies.actors: Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh, Thomas Mitchell
movies.plot: The manipulative daughter of a Georgia plantation owner conducts a turbulent romance with a roguish profiteer during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

movies.name: Girl, Interrupted
movies.actors: Winona Ryder, Angelina Jolie, Clea DuVall
movies.plot: Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the late 1960s.

movies.name: Mr. Nobody
movies.actors: Jared Leto, Sarah Polley, Diane Kruger
movies.plot: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

movies.name: The Mask
movies.actors: Jim Carrey, Cameron Diaz, Peter Riegert
movies.plot: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

movies.name: Lost and Delirious
movies.actors: Piper Perabo, Jessica Paré, Mischa Barton
movies.plot: After starting at an upmarket boarding school, a teenage girl forms close friendships with her two older roommates. However, when she discovers that her new friends are lovers she finds herself caught in a complicated situation.

movies.name: The Ring
movies.actors: Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson, Brian Cox
movies.plot: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone one week to the day after they view it.

movies.name: The Notebook
movies.actors: Gena Rowlands, James Garner, Rachel McAdams
movies.plot: A poor yet passionate young man (Ryan Gosling) falls in love with a rich young woman (Rachel McAdams), giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

movies.name: The East
movies.actors: Brit Marling, Alexander Skarsgård, Elliot Page
movies.plot: An operative for an elite private intelligence firm finds her priorities changing dramatically after she is tasked with infiltrating an anarchist group known for executing covert attacks upon major corporations.

movies.name: Gia
movies.actors: Angelina Jolie, Faye Dunaway, Elizabeth Mitchell
movies.plot: The story of the life of Gia Carangi, a top fashion model from the late 1970s, from her meteoric rise to the forefront of the modeling industry, to her untimely death.

movies.name: When in Rome
movies.actors: Kristen Bell, Josh Duhamel, Anjelica Huston
movies.plot: Beth is a young, ambitious New Yorker who is completely unlucky in love. However, on a whirlwind trip to Rome, she impulsively steals some coins from a reputed fountain of love, and is then aggressively pursued by a band of suitors.

movies.name: French Kiss
movies.actors: Meg Ryan, Kevin Kline, Timothy Hutton
movies.plot: A woman flying to France to confront her straying fiance gets into trouble when the charming crook seated next to her uses her for smuggling.

movies.name: Titanic
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane
movies.plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.name: Finding Nemo
movies.actors: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould
movies.plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

movies.name: Aladdin
movies.actors: Scott Weinger, Robin Williams, Linda Larkin
movies.plot: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

movies.name: Face/Off
movies.actors: John Travolta, Nicolas Cage, Joan Allen
movies.plot: To foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes facial transplant surgery to assume the identity of the criminal mastermind who murdered his only son, but the criminal wakes up prematurely and seeks revenge.

movies.name: 9/11: The Falling Man
movies.actors: Steven Mackintosh, Eric Lipton, Iliana Guibert
movies.plot: The Falling Man is a documentary that examines one of the many images that were circulated by the press immediately after the attacks on the World Trade Center on September 11th, 2001. The image in question can be seen above on th...

movies.name: Frozen
movies.actors: Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Jonathan Groff
movies.plot: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather co...

movies.name: Back to the Future
movies.actors: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson
movies.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

movies.name: Home Alone
movies.actors: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern
movies.plot: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

movies.name: Mulan
movies.actors: Ming-Na Wen, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong
movies.plot: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

movies.name: The Lake House
movies.actors: Keanu Reeves, Sandra Bullock, Christopher Plummer
movies.plot: A lonely doctor who once occupied an unusual lakeside house begins to exchange love letters with its former resident, a frustrated architect. They must try to unravel the mystery behind their extraordinary romance before it's too ...

movies.name: Kites
movies.actors: Hrithik Roshan, Bárbara Mori, Nicholas Brown
movies.plot: A wounded man searches for his sweetheart in the Mexican desert while on the run from the police, bounty hunters, and others.

movies.name: Melancholia
movies.actors: Kirsten Dunst, Charlotte Gainsbourg, Kiefer Sutherland
movies.plot: Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with Earth.

movies.name: Unknown
movies.actors: Liam Neeson, Diane Kruger, January Jones
movies.plot: When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is.

movies.name: Iron Man
movies.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard
movies.plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

movies.name: The Hobbit
movies.actors: Orson Bean, John Huston, Theodore Gottlieb
movies.plot: A homebody hobbit in Middle Earth gets talked into joining a quest with a group of dwarves to recover their treasure from a dragon.

movies.name: Black Hawk Down
movies.actors: Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor, Tom Sizemore
movies.plot: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis.

movies.name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
movies.actors: Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef
movies.plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

movies.name: For a Few Dollars More
movies.actors: Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volontè
movies.plot: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down an escaped Mexican outlaw.

movies.name: American Sniper
movies.actors: Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller, Kyle Gallner
movies.plot: Navy S.E.A.L. sniper Chris Kyle's pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend. Back home with his family after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he can't leave b...

movies.name: Once Upon a Time in the West
movies.actors: Henry Fonda, Charles Bronson, Claudia Cardinale
movies.plot: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

movies.name: The Lion King
movies.actors: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones
movies.plot: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.name: No End in Sight
movies.actors: Campbell Scott, Gerald Burke, Ali Fadhil
movies.plot: A comprehensive look at the Bush Administration's conduct of the Iraq war and its occupation of the country.

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise
movies.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood swe...

movies.name: Pretty Woman
movies.actors: Richard Gere, Julia Roberts, Jason Alexander
movies.plot: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

movies.name: You've Got Mail
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, Meg Ryan, Greg Kinnear
movies.plot: Book superstore magnate, Joe Fox and independent book shop owner, Kathleen Kelly fall in love in the anonymity of the Internet both blissfully unaware that he's trying to put her out of business.

movies.name: City of Angels
movies.actors: Nicolas Cage, Meg Ryan, Andre Braugher
movies.plot: An angel on Earth, a doctor unable to believe, a patient with a secret, a love story made in Heaven.

movies.name: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
movies.actors: Brad Pitt, Cate Blanchett, Tilda Swinton
movies.plot: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

movies.name: Scarface
movies.actors: Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer, Steven Bauer
movies.plot: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

movies.name: Night at the Museum
movies.actors: Ben Stiller, Carla Gugino, Ricky Gervais
movies.plot: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

movies.name: Jurassic Park
movies.actors: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum
movies.plot: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

movies.name: Overboard
movies.actors: Goldie Hawn, Kurt Russell, Edward Herrmann
movies.plot: A cruel but beautiful heiress mocks and cheats a hired carpenter. When she gets amnesia after an accident, he decides to introduce her to regular life by convincing her that they're husband and wife.

movies.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
movies.actors: Heather Langenkamp, Johnny Depp, Robert Englund
movies.plot: Teenager Nancy Thompson must uncover the dark truth concealed by her parents after she and her friends become targets of the spirit of a serial killer with a bladed glove in their dreams, in which if they die, it kills them in rea...

movies.name: Despicable Me
movies.actors: Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand
movies.plot: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

movies.name: The Terminator
movies.actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn
movies.plot: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvat...

movies.name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
movies.actors: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Adam Brody
movies.plot: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

movies.name: Mission: Impossible III
movies.actors: Tom Cruise, Michelle Monaghan, Ving Rhames
movies.plot: IMF agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancée in response.

movies.name: The Tourist
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Angelina Jolie, Paul Bettany
movies.plot: Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.

movies.name: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.actors: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman
movies.plot: Archaeology professor Indiana Jones ventures to seize a biblical artefact known as the Ark of the Covenant. While doing so, he puts up a fight against Renee and a troop of Nazis.

movies.name: Dances with Wolves
movies.actors: Kevin Costner, Mary McDonnell, Graham Greene
movies.plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Native Americans, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

movies.name: The Last of the Mohicans
movies.actors: Daniel Day-Lewis, Madeleine Stowe, Russell Means
movies.plot: Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

movies.name: Wheels on Meals
movies.actors: Jackie Chan, Biao Yuen, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung
movies.plot: Two Chinese friends, who operate a food truck in Barcelona, Spain, use their martial arts expertise to help their private investigator friend protect the pickpocket Sylvia, who's been targeted by a ruthless gang.

movies.name: My Trip to Al-Qaeda
movies.actors: Lawrence Wright
movies.plot: Chronicles fundamentalist Islam's rise to power and explores Wright's struggle to maintain his objectivity as a journalist writing about Islamic terror.

movies.name: The Legend of Zorro
movies.actors: Antonio Banderas, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Rufus Sewell
movies.plot: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.

movies.name: Spider Man: Lost Cause
movies.actors: Joey Lever, Craig Ellis, Teravis Ward
movies.plot: Peter Parker a lone child discovers that his parents were in a horrifying plot to make mankind change. getting bitten by his fathers invention he develops super powers to tries to find answers to his whole life, try and juggle a r...

movies.name: Game of Thrones
movies.actors: Emilia Clarke, Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington
movies.plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

movies.name: The Pianist
movies.actors: Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay
movies.plot: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

movies.name: Take Me Home Tonight
movies.actors: Topher Grace, Anna Faris, Dan Fogler
movies.plot: Four years after graduation, an awkward high school genius uses his sister's boyfriend's Labor Day party as the perfect opportunity to make his move on his high school crush.

movies.name: Troy
movies.actors: Brad Pitt, Eric Bana, Orlando Bloom
movies.plot: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

movies.name: Gladiator
movies.actors: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen
movies.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
movies.plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

movies.name: Hercules
movies.actors: Tate Donovan, Susan Egan, James Woods
movies.plot: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

movies.name: Цогт тайж
movies.actors: Ц. Цэгмид, Ч. Долгорсүрэн, Д. Бат-Очир, Ч. Цэвээн, Н. Цэгмид
movies.plot: 17-р зууны үед амьдарч байсан, эх оронч соён гэгээрүүлэгч Цогт хунтайжийн намтарт түшиглэн Манжийн түрэмгий бодлогын эсрэг тэмцэн боссон Монголчуудын тусгаар тогтнолын хөдөлгөөнийг уран сайхны аргаар чадварлаг боловсруулан тусгасан юм.

movies.name: Өглөө
movies.actors: Ц. Дашнамжил, Б. Амар, Ц. Цэрэндорж, З. Цэндээхүү, Д. Нямаа
movies.plot: 1921 оны Ардын хувьсгалын удирдагч, бүх цэргийн жанжин Д.Сүхбаатар тэргүүтэй ардын намынхан гадаад дотоодын дарлагчдыг устган эрх чөлөөт амьдралын өглөөг эх орондоо авчирч буйг харуулсан түүхэн уран сайхны кино.

movies.name: Говийн зэрэглээ
movies.actors: Г. Эрдэнэтогтох, Я. Оюунцэцэг, Г. Доржсамбуу, Н. Цэвээнравдан, Ж. Занабазар
movies.plot: Сумын төвийнхний жирийн амьдрал, хөдөө орон нутагт соёл, олон түмний ажил хэрхэн явагдаж байгаа тухай өгүүлэхдээ эх орныхоо үнэт баялгийг хайрлан хамгаалах, хүн арддаа тустай үйл бүтээх зорилготой залуусын зарчимч, шударга, хөдөлмөрч чанар, хөдөөгийн хүмүүсийн сайхан сэтгэл, хүнлэг ёс суртахууны түвшин зэргийг сургуулийн захирал Хашхүү, холбоочин бүсгүй Номин, тракторчин Арслангийн дүрээр дамжуулан харуулжээ.

movies.name: The Grudge
movies.actors: Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jason Behr, Clea DuVall
movies.plot: An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.

movies.name: Sinister
movies.actors: Ethan Hawke, Juliet Rylance, James Ransone
movies.plot: Washed-up true crime writer Ellison Oswalt finds a box of super 8 home movies in his new home, revealing that the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose legacy dates back to the 1960s.

movies.name: Null
movies.actors: Jacob Richardson
movies.plot: The character in this surrealist short film takes a medicine called "Null" that has very existential adverse effects.

movies.name: The Last Samurai
movies.actors: Tom Cruise, Ken Watanabe, Billy Connolly
movies.plot: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

movies.name: Stay
movies.actors: Ewan McGregor, Naomi Watts, Ryan Gosling
movies.plot: A psychiatrist attempts to prevent one of his patients from committing suicide while trying to maintain his own grip on reality.
